p: Coumarins such as umbelliferone and scopoletin are detected in all the three selected medicines and these are the plant coumarins reported from many medicinal plants. Phenolic compounds like caffeic acid and ferulic acid are found in both IK and VG. Gallic acid was identified from all the three selected medicines and has been reported from many ingredient plants. VG showed the presence of alkaloids such as curcumin, berberine, and palmatine which might have extracted from its ingredient plants like Piper nigrum, Piper longum, Curcuma longa, and Berberis aristata.
